summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Enslaved Yaksha Spirit
            - Section Title: Enslaved Yaksha Location

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Enslaved Yaksha Spirit

## Enslaved Yaksha Location

The Enslaved Yaksha requires you to complete a secret side quest before you can reach him. To begin, you will have to make your way to the Pagoda Realm. Work your way up the Pagoda until you reach the Upper Pagoda Keeper's Shrine. Once you reach the Shrine, turn 180 degrees to face the cliffs. Walk to the edge and look down to see a boss arena containing Captain Lotus-Vision."
            - Following Text: "Defeat the boss to unlock the purple seals preventing you from entering all of the jail cells in the Pagoda. The Enslaved Yaksha is locked inside one of these cells.

Follow our guide on how to remove the purple seals from the Pagoda cells if you're having trouble finding the boss!"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text describes the steps required to locate the Enslaved Yaksha Spirit. Players must complete a secret side quest, starting in the Pagoda Realm and progressing to the Upper Pagoda Keeper's Shrine. From there, they must locate and defeat a boss, Captain Lotus-Vision, in a cliffside arena to unlock purple seals that block access to jail cells in the Pagoda.

Image Summary:  
The image shows a character standing in front of a locked jail cell in a dimly lit, rocky environment. The cell contains a glowing blue figure, likely the Enslaved Yaksha Spirit referenced in the text. The character is equipped with a flaming staff, suggesting readiness for combat or exploration. This visual represents the culmination of the quest to locate the Enslaved Yaksha Spirit, as described in the preceding text.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text explains that defeating the boss, Captain Lotus-Vision, will remove the purple seals blocking access to the Pagoda jail cells. The Enslaved Yaksha Spirit is imprisoned in one of these cells, and additional guidance is available to help players unlock the seals if needed.
